metadata.title: Kama Sutra Treasures of the Sea Luxury Bathing Kit
features: Kama Sutra Treasures of the Sea Luxury Bathing Kit
description: Create a frothy bubble bath with this blend, which contains vitamins, minerals, and nutrients from the sea. Treasures of the Sea leaves your skin feeling soft, nourished, and reawakened. Sea shell scoop is included.
